channel.title: Login
channel.description: How can i make it so that when someone logs in it says "Wassap' PK-Evolution! I'm back!" and for new Players "wassap' PK-Evolution! I'm New!" with the guitar playing emote? It's 562 And i really wana code something like this.

item.title: Login
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok this 1 im not 100% sure of. first let just worry about when u log on as owner.

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("lil.astar")){
yell("Wassap' PK-Evolution! lil.astar Is back!");
}

this is an attempt to code others might fix my coding but lets give it a shot.

if(playerRights >= 0) {
yell("Wassap' PK-Evolution! "+playerName+" Is back!");
}

Read full topic
